Claim: "Three men wearing orange coats are working on a street."
Referring expressions: Three men, orange coats, street  Three men
Formula: (exists c (exists a (exists b ((IsWearingOrangeCoat(a) and IsWorkingOnStreet(b)) or IsWorkingOnStreet(c)))) & (forall d ( IsWearingOrangeCoat(d) ->  IsOutside(d)))) -> (exists c (exists a (exists b (IsOutside(a) and (IsOutside(b) and IsOutside(c))))))
